signature: public static Map<CharSequence, CharSequence> invert(final Map<CharSequence, CharSequence> map)
name: invert
javadoc:
/**
 * Inverts a given map by swapping its key-value pairs.
 *
 * @param map the input map to be inverted
 * @return a new map with the original values as keys and the original keys as values
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Inverts a given map by swapping its key-value pairs, effectively creating a new map where each key in the original map becomes a value and vice versa.
 *
 * @param map the input map to be inverted (must not be null)
 * @return a new map with the original values as keys and the original keys as values
 * @throws NullPointerException if the input map is null
 */
